review_data.title: Authentic & tasty food
review_data.content: Authentic food within a friendly family atmosphere. Good and friendly advises. Food was just amazing, hot but not too hot, and very tasty ! This is definitely a place to go.

review_data.title: klein aber fein
review_data.content: Das Restaurant ist sehr klein aber schön eingerichtet. Das Essen ist richtig gut und die Gerichte authentisch thailändisch.

review_data.title: Sehr Empfehlenswert!!!
review_data.content: Das Essen war einfach super!!! Sehr freundlicher Service! Wirklich empfehlenswert!!! Der beste Thai Restaurants in Zürich.

review_data.title: Heerlijke Thaise Keuken
review_data.content: Heerlijk gegeten. Traditionele gerechten op authentieke wijze klaargemaakt. Super vriendelijke bediening. We komen zeker terug als we naar Zürich komen...

review_data.title: Very satisfying dinner
review_data.content: I enjoyed my green curry very much; decent prices (for Zürich!) attentive service. simple table furnishing; Thai decor all around.

review_data.title: First time Thai
review_data.content: It is my first time to try thai food. We ordered three different meals. each meal comes with rice (not big portion though). The taste was very good especially the chicken with carry one.

review_data.title: Tolle, authentische Speisen,
review_data.content: Tolle, authentische Speisen, sehr freundlicher Service! Eines der besten Thai Restaurants in Zürich.

review_data.content: The lunch buffet is very good and reasonably priced at CHF 21.- per person, including a soft drink bottle. One dish is extra hot for all those who like it spicy like me. A good place for a Thai buffet!!!

review_data.title: Great Thai food in Zurich
